dct_title_s: Cape of Good Hope. Schuit Drift
dct_description_sm: Topographical map indicating Schuit Drift and towns and villages, roads, railways, rivers and other features in the area of Schuit Drift, a ford on the Orange River.
Relief shown by contours, form lines and spot heights.
Map folds into an outer cover.
Inset map: Schuit Drift (scale 1 in. to 0.5 miles).
Descriptive text on nature of country, roads, transport, water, fuel, grazing and supplies.
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
